traits.name: Source
traits.desc: tales from the yawning portal,  page 243

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: Siren can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: Siren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * 1/day each: charm person, fog cloud, greater invisibility, polymorph (self only).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stupefying Touch
actions.desc: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (3d6 + 3) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of Siren's next turn.
